settings.helpText: Can be plain text url or a template with this format "https://{{base-url}}-brand.vercel.app/". Everything between double curly braces will be replaced with the env variable NEXT_PUBLIC_BRAND_PICKER_URL_TEMPLATE_VALUE.
Brand logo to display in the header
Small brand logo to display in the multisite picker. If null, the main brand logo will be used.
Small brand logo to display as favicon/shortcut icon
Other sites to display in the multi-brand picker
